title: Track a Contract Renewal Date
description: An in-house legal department needs to track the renewal date of a key software license to decide whether to renew or terminate.

tasks.description: Extract the key dates from the software license agreement, including the effective date, term, and renewal notification deadline.
Enter these dates into a contract management system or a shared calendar.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent successfully dockets the key dates.

tasks.description: Set up automated reminders for the responsible attorney 90, 60, and 30 days before the renewal notification deadline.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent ensures the deadline will not be missed.
